description: This is a React component file implementing a login page interface with form validation, handling authentication through context, and navigation upon success.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: React functional component that renders a login form, manages form state, handles form submission, and authenticates the user through a provided context.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Asynchronous handler for form submission, validates input, initiates login process, and navigates on success or sets error on failure.
